item.title: A New Engine… Again (And A Few Other Changes)
item.dc:creator: Chris “Kwpolska” Warrick
item.description:
Upda­te 2013-02-07: Now run­ning Ni­ko­la.

Hel­lo the­re. I ha­ve a few an­no­un­ce­ments for you.

First of­f, I chan­ged the blog en­gi­ne. It is now ran by Hy­de, a port of Je­kyll to Py­thon (but im­pro­ve­d).

Se­cond of­f, all posts from 2009 we­re ar­chi­ved. If you are cra­zy and want to re­ad the­m, see 2009 Ar­chi­ves. They wo­n’t be vi­si­ble on the Blog pa­ge.

Third of­f, the URLs of posts we­re chan­ged a bi­t, but they are fi­xed by the se­rver.

Fo­urth of­f, the Pro­jects pa­ge will get a lit­tle ma­ke­over so­on.

That is all.

Czytaj więcej… (0 paragraphs remaining — a 1 minutes’ read)

item.title: Jekyll for Dummies
item.dc:creator: Chris “Kwpolska” Warrick
item.description:
This post is an in­tro­duc­tion to Je­kyl­l, an awe­so­me, sim­ple, blog awa­re, sta­tic si­te ge­ne­ra­tor. It’s a ho­w-to hel­ping you in set­ting up Je­kyll.

…e­ven tho­ugh I am cur­ren­tly using Ni­ko­la, and I sug­gest you to do the sa­me.

item.title: Jekyll, Welcome Home. + OMG I WROTE SOMETHING
item.dc:creator: Chris “Kwpolska” Warrick
item.description:
Two posts for the pri­ce of one, ri­ght after the bre­ak. Wha­t’s fun­ny is, bo­th a­re out of da­te, as this blog has went thro­ugh Hy­de and is cur­ren­tly po­we­re­d by Ni­ko­la.
